A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The movie gave me the same feeling I had when I saw Avatar\, thought it was pretty cool when I first went to see it\, but then as soon as the movie was over\, all the plot holes\, terrible writing and such OVERT hamhanded focus on sjw and PC themes became hard to ignore.

This movie basically makes all the prior movies pointless in regards the story.

It also wasnt just me\, my 15 and 12 year old sons noticed the messages of the story too\, and their interest in things Star Wars has gone down quite a bit.
